Greedy Word Swap¶

class attacks.greedy_word_swap.GreedyWordSwap(model, perturbation, max_depth=32)[source]¶

An attack that greedily chooses from a list of possible perturbations.

Parameters

  • model – The PyTorch NLP model to attack

  • perturbation – The type of perturbation

  • max_depth (int, optional) – The maximum number of words to change. Defaults to 32.

Returns

The result of the attack
